name: Super Sky Soldier
description:
This is my first Unity game. Testing out the engine. Shoot at an armada of enemy ships, then fight a big fish :)

How to play:
Z - shoot missile
X - shoot bullets
Arrow keys - move your ship

The graphics for the player and enemy ships were taken from Darius. Sound effects and music are from zapsplat.com, soundsnap.com, soundfishing.eu, chosic.com, mixkit.co, and storyblocks.com
